attributes.action: Provide free period products for all girls and women via the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Access to period products is essential for health, dignity and equality. Many girls and women cannot afford these products, leading to missed school or work, poor menstrual hygiene, and negative health outcomes.

The NHS already provides essential healthcare free at the point of use. Providing period products through the NHS would help prevent period poverty, support menstrual health, and reduce health inequalities, aligning with Government commitments to women’s health.
attributes.background: Provide free period products via the NHS for all girls and women, ensuring access through GP surgeries, pharmacies, hospitals and schools, to reduce period poverty, support menstrual health, and promote equality.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free female sanitary products for all women and girls
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756958
